cont.entity_a: Efficient in transferring data from old drives to current storage technology.
cont.entity_b: Effective for retrieving data from old disks.

cont.entity_a: Affordable compared to external zip disk drives priced between $80-$200.
Records files quickly. Fast and dependable with no disc failures.
cont.entity_b: eSATA connection is extremely fast. Easy to install with a small footprint and excellent performance. Quiet and efficient. Boosts DirecTV's HR20-700 DVR capacity significantly. Triples original recording capacity on DirecTV DVR.

cont.entity_a: Provides automatic backup of key files.
No special software required for use.
cont.entity_b: Firmware updates available to address some issues.

cont.entity_a: USB cord is preferred for quick data retrieval.
cont.entity_b: USB interface works well, but eSATA interface causes system lockups.

cont.entity_a: No longer has web support from Iomega.
cont.entity_b: Seagate support offers replacements but with refurbished units.
Looks great and is reliable. Interchangeable design for spare parts. Orange glow is noticeable.
Runs very hot and can cause system issues.

cont.entity_a: Received a used product instead of a new one, leading to dissatisfaction.
cont.entity_b: Temperamental and prone to freezing. Insufficient power supply leads to failures. Issues with stock availability from Amazon.
